Package net.xqhs.flash.core

Interface RunnableEntity<P extends Entity<?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - - the type of the entity that can contain (be the context of) this entity.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Entity<P>, java.lang.Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeAgent, LocalPylon
    public interface RunnableEntity<P extends Entity<?>>
extends Entity<P>, java.lang.Runnable
    This version of Entity adds the method Runnable.run(), enabling whoever holds a reference to this entity to also control the thread on which the entity executes.
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.xqhs.flash.core.Entity

        Entity.EntityIndex, Entity.EntityProxy<C extends Entity<?>>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void run()
      The method will start the entity and will only returned after the entity has been Entity.stop()ed.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.xqhs.flash.core.Entity

        addContext, addGeneralContext, asContext, getName, isRunning, removeContext, removeGeneralContext, start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run()
        The method will start the entity and will only returned after the entity has been Entity.stop()ed.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
